tasks.label: make
args: . $(dirname $(which spack))/../share/spack/setup-env.sh && spack env activate aperi-mech && ./do_configure && cd build/Release && make -j 4

tasks.label: make_gpu
args: . $(dirname $(which spack))/../share/spack/setup-env.sh && spack env activate aperi-mech-gpu-develop && ./do_configure --gpu && cd build/Release_gpu && make -j 4
